Carnage/ Dinobot.

* Carnage looked over at Cyber Claw, her breath smelling strongly of fresh 
crab. She looked back at the flying Island and sighed.*

" I guess so, it has to be on that flying chunk of rock. That's where the 
signatures that I'm detecting are coming from."

* She looked down at the ground but then back up at the Island, soon she 
would have to leave Teltoli and go after Megatron.*


*******************************************************

* Dinobot dodged out of the way just as Scourge kicked at him, but there was 
just one problem...he hadn't dodged far enough!
The force of Scourge's kick forced him backwards and right into the Ark's 
shield, he felt a deadly surge of energy as he struck the defensive wall of 
power.
Dinobot dropped from the shield and landed on one knee, he hung his head as 
his systems realined themselves. It only took nano-clicks and he was back on 
his feet. He glared at Scourge and growled, without warning he lept forward 
with his claws drawn and slashed down at the Predacon with a roar of rage!
With his rifle out of reach now Dinobot fought the best way he knew, 
hand-to-hand combat! His favorite.
Dinobot brought his other claw up and under into the bottom of Scourge's 
jaw, now he would know what this 'lizard' was capable of. And he would find 
out a lot more if he didn't surrender and go back to base.*
